## Purchases.getSharedInstance() method

Get the singleton instance of Purchases. It's preferred to use the instance obtained from the [Purchases.configure()](./purchases-js.purchases.configure.md) method when possible.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSharedInstance(): Purchases;
```
**Returns:**

[Purchases](./purchases-js.purchases.md)

## Exceptions

[UninitializedPurchasesError](./purchases-js.uninitializedpurchaseserror.md) if the instance has not been initialized yet.
